page.title: 04The Village Of Blackwell B
page.content: Few facilities in the village: a post-office, butcher and a grocer.Evening entertainment: The Miner's Welfare or The Blackwell Arms. You are only considered{local}if you have lived here for at least 40 years! Soccer and cricket have replaced the pit as the chief concern in the village. A fiercely proud old codger stated that a job at the pit depended on a man's ability on the sports field. It was in fact rumoured that the soccer committee, with N.C.B. connections, would go to great lengths to import good players from nearby areas. The village turns out in force to support their teams, winter and summer each Sunday afternoon.
